::Rex/Perndabot::

Rex takes a step backwards as he waits, frowning. There =
had to be a 
bot somewhere in the room, she couldn't have just dissapeared!=


"Doors, stay locked untill further command from either me, Kluster, 
Fire=
arm, or Chordate," he says, listing the four bots he trusted the 
most. He =
activates his comm-link.

"Something's weird here, Chordate," he says into =
it, "I may need a
bit 
of help."

Rex squints through the water droplets, a=
nother command deactivating 
them. He murmurs something else, the flame thr=
owers in the room 
activating.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Perndabot =
swears, rounding a corner to see more doors. He was lost, 
again. He had be=
en trying to find the brig, but so far, has had no 
luck. He didn't want to=
 activate his comm, the Maximals would
probably 
track the transmission bac=
k to him.

Perndabot continues walking, going the wrong way again.
